title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.
descriptions:
The student response includes none of these criteria.

  • Correct slope for asymptote

  • Equation for asymptote that demonstrates a correct process for line containing ( −2,6 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F29@ , with a maximum of one computational error
